pages.text: The hell is seen by many as a sore sight, draining a lot of $(aura) from the Nether realm does however degrade the environment there, making it truly unsightly. $(item)Glowstone$() will begin to turn into $(item)Nether Quartz Ore$() which will, in turn, slowly degrade into $(item)Nether Brick$(). $(item)Nether Brick$() becomes $(item)Netherrack$() which eventually becomes $(item)Soul Sand$().
